Just finished getting dressed. My shirt really tight though.

Anyway, how's your Christmas preparations?
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546947006368727c72e10000#post_546947006368727c72e10000

In this country we have the Mexican Revolution first, then the Virgin of Guadalupe's celebration, _then_ the final exams for many students, then it's finally christmas.
